title: Downhill Skiing
description: Skiing at Big Sky, MT has been a part of my life for the past 20 years. Nothing beats the experience of skiing fresh powder from the summit of Lone Peak. If I can't find fresh powder, you will find me jumping off random features and avoiding trees.

title: Mountain Biking
description: I started mountain biking a few years ago, and it has quickly become one of my favorite activities. Not only does it provide an exhilarating workout, mountain biking allows me to explore nature in a unique way.

image.alt: Mountain biking on a rock feature with an overlook of a forest below

title: Rock Climbing
description: I spend a great deal of time climbing in the gym. I really enjoy the physical and mental challenge that rock climbing provides. Nothing quite beats the feeling of completing a route or boulder problem that I have been working on for a few climbing sessions. If you haven’t tried climbing before, I highly recommend it.

image.alt: Climbing an artifical boulder problem at an indoor rock climbing facility

title: Slalom Water Skiing
description: Growing up in Minnesota, I have always enjoyed being on a lake during a hot summer day. And even better than being on a lake, is water skiing on a lake.

image.alt: Climbing an artifical boulder problem at an indoor rock climbing facility

title: Photography
description: When I’m able to get outdoors, I have been starting to undertake landscape and nature photography. I have always had a love of space and the stars, so I particularly enjoy starscapes, and learning about astrophotography.

image.alt: The milkyway stretched across the night sky
